title: Taking Offers T206 " Blue Faced Hartsel "
author: mrvster

posts.post_title: Taking Offers T206 " Blue Faced Hartsel "
posts.post_content:
Hello All!

A very weird and cool color shift of Hartsel, giving the appearance of a "blue face".....a major color shift, that strangely doesn't affect the bottom portion of the green:confused:...

there is some kind of notation written on the front.....the card has a num grade, but is a tad short and may have been cut neatly down from a sheet??

very strange card.....some have suggested this may be a printer's notation to adjust the litho stone ....I guess we may never know..


taking rare back T206 trade, scrap, or cash offers...



:)


pm if you like
